pages.title: Executive Dashboard
pages.desc: High level summarized analytics of all the surveys at Lanka Hospitals, including NPS and Satisfaction Scores.

cards.title: Response breakdown with comments
cards.desc: Overall survey participation for quick overview

cards.title: Geo Map of the respondents to the survey
cards.desc: Geographic distribution of responses

cards.title: 2D response analytics
cards.desc: Visualizes connections between two specific survey questions

cards.title: Correlation analytics
cards.desc: Analyzes relationships between various response variables

cards.title: Raw responses
cards.desc: Provides access to the unfiltered, original survey responses

cards.title: Comment sentiment analysis
cards.desc: Categorizes comments from the survey into positive, negative, and neutral sentiments

cards.title: Score heatmap
cards.desc: Highlights response scores across different sections for quick identification of strong and weak areas

cards.title: Score segment trend
cards.desc: Tracks score changes over time and across different segments

pages.title: Ward-level Satisfaction
pages.desc: Help identify satisfaction levels in multiple departments across all Wards.

pages.title: Department Score Analysis
pages.desc: Highlights scores across different Departments for quick identification of strong and weak areas
